Text.Page:
Our shipment of eldritch shards is hung up somewhere in Bleakrock.

Go there and ask Kilda what we have to do to get them yesterday.

The shards?

It's not my fault. The wendigos are on the rampage. The junaidar are raiding the camps. A passing popori ate them...okay, I just don't have any right now. Try Forsil.

My shards are all earmarked for Allemantheia. Don't even bother trying to outbid the Mysterium.

Just between us, I've heard a rumor that the magistrate has been hanging on to a private hoard.
No, I haven't been hoarding shards! Is he crazy?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"There really aren't any?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
No. I'm sorry. They don't exactly grow on trees.
